column2: George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act Two (2014) #5
column6: CONCLUDING THE 2ND CHILLING CHAPTER OF GEORGE ROMERO'S UNDEAD EPIC! - Is Barnum a vampire? Is Penny becoming one? - Can Dixie control the rogue militia...and what is their grand plan? - What happens to Jo and Xavier in our climactic scene that will set the stage for Act Three?
column8: | penciller (cover):Alexander Lozano | writer:George Romero | artist:Dalibor Talajic
